title: N172 Old Judge #297-7 Mike Mattimore (sliding) - SGC 6.5
author: benedini

posts.post_title: N172 Old Judge #297-7 Mike Mattimore (sliding) - SGC 6.5
posts.post_content:
Beautiful and very scarce (granted, most of these are) Old Judge. High end card with a small ink mark on back and tiny dent just above lower left corner (near his outstretched hand). 

SGC pop 1 (total SGC pop 4), none higher. 
PSA total pop 2, 1 is higher (an 8 but an old grade and comparing the two you couldn't tell any difference)  
SOLD THANK YOU including express delivery or 3% discount for Zelle/FF/check. 

New seller to here - member for past 18 months - and have purchased items from a few of you before. Just selling off a part of my collection as I have a slightly different focus now (changes often). eBay user ID is megalodonteeth so you can see feedback. Thanks for looking - Steve
Thanks it is a beauty! Sale pending

That is a stunning image! My favorite type of OJ. I'd take an image like that on a "common" over a HOF'er you can barely make out any day.

Good luck with the sale.

[quote name="LEHR" post=2472253]That is a stunning image! My favorite type of OJ. I'd take an image like that on a "common" over a HOF'er you can barely make out any day.

Good luck with the sale.[/QUOTE]

Thanks and no doubt. I love these "staged action" shots they came up with for these cards. Then having an image with this clarity is icing on the top. I didn't even know I wanted it until I saw it - then I had to have it :)
